TestGroupDocumentation.Title: maxExclusive1 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a maxExclusive-1.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a positiveInteger restricted SimpleType with maxExclusive value 2.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML positiveInteger maxExclusive-1.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxExclusive-1-1.xml document which specifies valid value 1 for the positiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-positiveInteger-maxExclusive-1 element, sets the values: 1 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML positiveInteger maxExclusive-1.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxExclusive-1-1.xml document which specifies valid value 1 for the positiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-positiveInteger-maxExclusive-1 element, sets the values: 2, 0, Integer.MIN_VALUE, Integer.MAX_VALUE and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML positiveInteger maxExclusive-1.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of positiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-positiveInteger-maxExclusive-1 type, sets the values: 1 and expects the validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML positiveInteger maxExclusive-1.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of positiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-positiveInteger-maxExclusive-1 type, sets the values: 2, 0, Integer.MIN_VALUE, Integer.MAX_VALUE and expects validation to fail.
